name: G&S Forum Restyle
description: Restyles the forum to make it easier on the eye and also fixes some bugs.
additional_info:
For discussion & more details (full change log) look here:
http://forums.geekandsundry.com/forums/discussion/7007
v1.4.2:Fixes for new site style bleeding through into the forum.
v1.4.1:Replaced sidebar +/- image. Now has correct transparency.
v1.4.0:Fix for the fix. :/
v1.3.9:Fixes a few bugs caused by latest forum upgrade.

v1.3.8:Z-issue fixed correctly now!
v1.3.7:"Fix" reverted. Change avatar banner styled. Inbox drop shadow now conforms with others. Z-index issue fixed.
v1.3.6:Trying a fix for touchscreens to allow the options flyout to be used.

v1.3.5:All links now styled, edit-profile pages finished. More misc changes.

v1.3.2:Padding readjusted to give the original 650px width posts. (regaining 8px)

v1.3.1:Notification popup restyled.

v1.3:Flyout menus given green highlight, preview header formatting fixed. Misc changes.

v1.2:Search page formatting fixed, buttons restyled and various other misc. changes.

v1.1: Thread preview really fixed this time. Also some other minor changes which will hopefully further improve usability on mobiles/small screens.
